property.name: Text
property.value: Redirect one challenge each round. The new target is chosen by the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supports: Master of Whisper. Opposes: Master of Coin.

property.name: Text
property.value: Redirect against yourself one defended Military challenge each round. If you win the challenge, take one power from the attacker.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The redirect ability on Lord Commander of the Kingsguard occurs during step 2 (save/cancel) of the resolution of the Framework Action Window in which stealth targets are chosen and defenders are (not) declared. It cancels the initiation of this Window, and re-opens the Player Action Window between declaring attackers (now against the new target) and assigning stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supports: Hand of the King. Opposes: Master of Whispers.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supports: Master of Laws. Opposes: Hand of the King.

property.name: Text
property.value: Supports: Master of Coin. Opposes: Master of Laws, Crown Regent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Item. Weapon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel and discard Ice from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill another participating character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stark character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Kneel Nymeria to save attached character from being killed. If attached character is Arya Stark, she also gets +1 STR and gains stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stark character only.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains a Military icon. If attached character is Bran Stark, he gains stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stark character only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Rodrik Cassel does not kneel to defend. Ser Rodrik Cassel gets +2 STR while defending.

property.name: Text
property.value: Eddard Stark claims 1 power when he comes into play.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Stalwart. Renown. Deadly.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lady. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Catelyn Stark is declared as a defender, choose a participating character. For the duration of the challenge, that character does not count its STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Kneel 1 influence to choose a character with stealth or renown. Until the end of the phase, that character loses those keywords, and Arya Stark gains any keyword that was lost in this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: after you win a Military challenge in which Robb Stark participates, choose and kill a character controlled by the losing player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a player plays an attachment on Sansa Stark, that player may draw a card.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Greatjon Umber to have him participate in the current Military or Power challenge as either the attacker or as the defender.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control at least 1 Stark Lord character, Shaggydog gets +3 STR and is immune to events.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Hodor cannot be declared as an attacker. Hodor cannot be bypassed with stealth.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Plot: Kneel Bran Stark to choose and reveal a new plot card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: If Robb Stark is in play, lower the cost to play Grey Wind by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sansa Stark gets +1 STR and gains renown. If Sansa Stark is in play, lower the cost to play Lady by 2.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: You may put Winterfell Honor Guard into play from your hand, under the control of any opponent. After that opponent wins a challenge in which Winterfell Honor Guard participated, take control of Winterfell Honor Guard.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. No attachments.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. House Tully.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Direwolf.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Stark only. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Kennel Master gets +1 STR for each Direwolf in play. While you control 3 or more Direwolf cards, Kennel Master gains: 'Response: Save Kennel Master from being killed or discarded, and return him to his owner's hand.'

property.name: Traits
property.value: Ally. House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel to lower the cost of the next Stark character you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tully.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Return Trident Reinforcements from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Winterfell Reserves is declared as a defender, pay 1 gold to put the top card of a player's discard pile on top of his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Winterfell Kennels and pay 1 gold to search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal that card to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Winterfell. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Stark characters gets +1 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Northern Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next Stark card you play this phase by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may choose to play Lord Eddard's Chambers as an attachment to your House card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Winterfell. Stronghold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Godswood to lower the cost of the next Stark character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: House
property.value: Stark. Baratheon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Discard Narrow Sea from play to reduce the cost of the next Stark or Baratheon character you play this phase by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR and gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Pay 1 gold and discard Gilded Plate from play (cannot be saved) to save attached character from being killed or discarded.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a Lord or Lady character is killed, Joffrey Baratheon claims 1 power. (Limit 3 times per round.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Lord. Knight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ser Jaime Lannister does not kneel to attack or defend during a M challenge.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Infamy. Deadly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an I challenge or a challenge in which Tyrion Lannister participated, pay 1 gold to draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel Cersei Lannister and pay 2 gold to choose a character. Kneel that character if it is standing. That character does not stand during the standing phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the marshalling phase, take 2 gold from the treasury and place it on Tywin Lannister. You may spend gold tokens on Tywin Lannister as if they are in your gold pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Ser Ilyn Payne to choose and kill a character with STR 2 or lower.

property.name: Text
property.value: If The Hound is killed, place him in your discard pile instead of your dead pile. At the beginning of the dominance phase, discard the top card from your deck or discard the Hound from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge in which at least 1 Clansman character participated, pay X gold to choose and return a location to its owner's hand, where X is the printed gold cost of that location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Knight. Mercenary.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 2 gold to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, if that character would be killed and Bronn is kneeling, stand Bronn instead of killing that character.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Deadly. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After an opponent's effect reveals one or more cards, reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand (limit 3 per phase).

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: Grand Maester Pycelle cannot trigger his effect in response to the effect of another copy of Grand Maester Pycelle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to look at the top card of an opponent's deck. Then put that card either on the top or bottom of his or her deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Ser Jacelyn Bywater is killed, each opponent must choose and discard a card at random from his or her hand, if able.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Immune to character abilities.

property.name: Traits
property.value: House Tyrell.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Enemy Informer from your hand, choose and kneel a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an I challenge in which Qyburn's Informers participated, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Cersei Lannister or Cersei's Attendant is killed, choose and kneel a character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win an I challenge, pay 1 gold to claim 1 power for your House (limit once per challenge).

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a knelt character stands during the standing phase, kneel Lannisport Brothel to kneel that character.

property.value: Lannisport Brothel should be unique.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each time you reveal a plot card, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets +2 STR while it has a P icon. Attached character gets -2 STR while it does not have a P icon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to an opponent's character. Attached character's controller must give you 1 gold token from his or her gold pool each time he or she wishes to declare attached character as an attacker or defender, or trigger attached character's ability.

property.value: Response: Kneel Lightbringer to save attached character from being killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Robert Baratheon claims power for renown, he claims an additional power.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Stannis Baratheon is attacking and the defending player controls no Lord characters, that player cannot declare defenders.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a P challenge by 4 or more total STR, stand Ser Axel Florent.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limited Response: After you win a P challenge as the attacker by 4 or more total STR, discard Edric Storm from play (cannot be saved) to initiate an additional P challenge this phase. (Limit 1 Limited Response per round.)

property.name: Text
property.value: While any character you control has 1 or more power, Devan Seaworth gains stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Knight of the Rainwood cannot be discarded from play.

property.name: Keywords

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Army of the Faithful by 1 for each Asshai character you control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Renown. No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel Renly's Courtier to choose a non-unique character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as though its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

property.name: Keywords

property.name: Traits

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After one of your Baratheon characters is killed, put House Tyrell Guard into play from your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: No attachments.

property.name: Text
property.value: Players may take actions after plot cards are chosen as part of the plot phase, but before they are revealed. Plot: After plot cards are chosen but before they are revealed, name a plot card. For each opponent that reveals the named plot card this phase, claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: ErrataText
property.value: The Plot phase effect should read: "...Limit once per phase."

property.value: Marshalling: Kneel Stormlands Fiefdoms to lower the cost of the next Baratheon card you play this phase by 1.

property.value: While participating in a challenge, attached character gets +6 STR and gains the Dragon trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attached character gets -2 STR. Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to move Poisoned Wine to another eligible character.

property.name: Text
property.value: While attached character has a M icon, it gains +2 STR. While attached character has an I icon, it gains stealth. While attached character has a P icon, it gains renown.

property.name: Text
property.value: If attached character has no other attachments, attached character gets -2 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

property.value: If you win a challenge in which Daenerys Targaryen attacked alone, move all gold tokens from the losing opponent's gold pool to your gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a challenge, put Khal Drogo into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, return Khal Drogo to his owner's hand.

property.value: Magister Illyrio's effect expires at the end of the phase.

property.value: Response: Play after you win dominance. Kneel 2 of your Stark characters to have them claim 1 power each.

property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains deadly. Then, attach I'm You Writ Small to a HL character (counts as a Boon attachment with the text ';Attached character gets +2 STR';).

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you lose a challenge, kneel one of your HL characters to choose and kill a participating character controlled by the winning opponent.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Small Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any phase: Choose and kneel a non-N character. Then, that character claims 1 power.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Marshalling: Kneel one of your Knight characters to search your deck for a Knight character, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Pay 1 gold to take an attachment from your discard pile and attach it to a character you control. If the attachment cannot be legally attached, it is discarded.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 3 influence or kneel a N character to force an opponent to reveal a new plot card. If the newly revealed plot card has a lower income than yours, claim 1 power for your House.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Baratheon only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After one of your unique characters is killed, return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your dead pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a P challenge, choose any gold or influence producing location controlled by an opponent, and take control of that location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Kneel 1 influence to search your deck for a Dragon card, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -1 STR. Dominance: Kneel 1 influence or pay 2 gold to return Forever Burning from your dead pile to your hand.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only. DeatBaratheonound.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you win a P challenge by 4 or more total STR, choose a non-unique character controlled by the losing opponent. Take control of that character. Limit 1 per phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Dominance: Kneel 4 influence to discard all characters from play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Any Phase: Choose and stand a H , L , N , or W character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Challenges: Kneel Shae to choose and kneel a character controlled by a player with more power than you.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Free Cities.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play a HT character, return an attachment with printed cost equal to or lower than that character from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each search your decks for a character, reveal it, and put it into your hands. Then, shuffle your decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare P challenges against one another this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: In order to initiate a M challenge, an attacker must give the defender 2 gold tokens from his or her gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters, locations, and attachments do not provide income bonuses this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, copy the ';when revealed'; ability of an opponent's revealed plot card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Knight characters gets +1 STR and is immune to opponent's character abilities.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 locations. All locations not chosen are discarded from play (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each choose and kneel a standing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare I challenges against one another this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Skip the taxation phase this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, each player chooses up to 3 of his or her characters. All characters not chosen are killed (cannot be saved).

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters without an I icon get -1 STR.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Lannister only.

property.name: Text
property.value: The income on each opponent's revealed plot card is reduced to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Blood in your plot deck. N characters cannot be killed.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent must each search your decks for a location, reveal it, and put it into your hands. Then, shuffle your decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, if you have more than one opponent, choose an opponent. You and that opponent cannot declare M challenges against one another this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control fewer characters than any opponent, each character you control gets +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: In order to play an event card, a player must give an opponent one gold token from his or her gold pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the beginning of the standing phase, choose one kneeling character or location controlled by each player. Return all chosen cards to their owner's hands.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may have up to 2 copies of The Power of Arms in your plot deck. W characters you control get +2 STR.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per plot deck. When revealed, kill all characters in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, that opponent must choose and kill a character he or she does not control, if able.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose an opponent. Then, you and that opponent each draw three cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each character you control gets +1 STR for each attachment on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When revealed, choose and discard an attachment from play, if able.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: House Targaryen only.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot be cancelled. When revealed, the player with the most cards in hand chooses and discards cards from his hand until he has 4 cards in hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Characters with STR 2 or lower cannot stand during the standing phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Non-unique characters cannot be declared as defenders.
